event.name: Baby Sheila
event.description: Here is my mom as a tiny baby.  Check out those cheeks!

event.name: Sheila as a toddler
event.description: Here is my mom as a toddler.

event.name: Kid Sheila
event.description: Checkout my mom as a little girl!  What a cool picture.

event.name: Big Momma
event.description: Here is a picture of Big Momma standing at the doorway to her home.

event.name: Sheila and Uncle Brian
event.description: My mom and Uncle Brian.

event.name: Sheila and Brian as young adults
event.description: Check out my mom and uncle back in the day!

event.name: Sheila and Crew
event.description: This looks like a tough crowd!  I bet no one messed with them!

event.name: Sheila and grandson, Elijah
event.description: Here is my mom with her grandson, Elijah

event.name: Sheila and Sons
event.description: This photo was taken during Christmas of 2013.  It was nice to have a pic with the three of us.

event.name: Sheila and Grandaughter, Faith
event.description: Here is my mom and her grandaughter, Faith.  Faith loves sports and Sheila loved to see her grandkids compete at their sporting events.

event.name: Sheila with Brother, Niece and Nephews
event.description: Where ever this is, it looked like a place I want to go for dinner.  The looks on my family's faces says it all!

event.name: Sheila and Friends
event.description: This photo was taken at one of the benefits my mom attended hosted by some big name celeberties.

event.name: Sheila at Cinco de Drink-O
event.description: My mom sure did love a good margarita.

event.name: More Benefit Pics
event.description: Here is another benefit pic of my mom.

event.name: Sheila Smiling
event.description: She was really happy in this photo.  This picture looks like it was taken in the 90's.

event.name: Sheila and George Lopez!
event.description: I have to admit, this is one of my favorite pics of her and a celeberty.  Like my mother, George Lopez also had kidney failure.

event.name: Cool Drinks with the Grand kids
event.description: Sheila with her grand kids, Faith and Eric Jr. enjoying a refreshing drink.

event.name: Sheila at the Family Reunion
event.description: Every summer, the family in Texas holds a family reunion.  Here is my mom surounded by relatives.

event.name: Sheila and the Hatams'
event.description: Sheila with her bosses enjoying a fine day at work.

event.name: Father and Daughter
event.description: Sheila with her biological father, Hubert Mack.  I like this photo.  I spoke to him on the phone once.  Very nice man.

event.name: Classy Ladies
event.description: What a classy group of ladies here!

event.name: Sheila and Lupe
event.description: Here is my mom and one of her best friends, Lupe.  These two seemed to bring out the best in eachother.

event.name: Sheila and Lupe A.
event.description: Sheila has a few freinds named Lupe LOL!  Lupe A. was a close friend and my brother and I were good friends with her sons, David and Danny.

event.name: Sheila and Lupe A. part 2
event.description: Here is a more recent photo of Sheila and Lupe A.

event.name: Magic and Shiela
event.description: I This photo was also taken at the benefit.  This time with Magic Johnson!! This is a nice pic.

event.name: Good times in NoHo
event.description: This was a fun barbeque in North Hollywood back in 2004.  Jewel, her son and her daughter were with us.

event.name: Generations
event.description: This is a photo of my grandmother, mother, and my niece, Jazmine.  I was in there for good measure.  The 90's were an interesting time for fashion lol!

event.name: Mother and Daughter
event.description: Here are my grandmother and mother both wearing red shirts.  I believe this was taken in the late 80's.  She really loved momma and it shows in this picture.

event.name: Sheila with baby Eric
event.description: Looks like they were happy to be home with my then, infant older brother, Eric!

event.name: SHeila and Samuel J Jackson
event.description: Another photo taken during the benefit.  This time with Samuel L. Jackson!

event.name: Selfie Time
event.description: Sheila certainly enjoyed the camera.  She often took selfies of herself, especially when her hair was recently done.

event.name: Selfie Time 2
event.description: More selfie time for Sheila!

event.name: Sheila by the tree
event.description: This photo was taken about 6 years ago when I first moved back to California.  That tree really accents the picture nicely.

event.name: Sheila, Brian, Momma, and Victor
event.description: A cool photo taken of my mom, uncle, grandmother and Sheila's boyfriend, Victor.

event.name: Techiba!
event.description: Who can forget the love of my mom's life, Techiba!!  She absoultely adored her little doggy friends and she would go to great lengths to care for them.

event.name: EJ Playing Ball
event.description: EJ during his basketball days!

event.name: EJ Playing Ball 2
event.description: More basketball fun for EJ.  My mom took these pics during her time at the game.

event.name: Elijah at age 4
event.description: Here is her grandson, Elijah when he was 4 years old.  He was waiting to visit his friend, Jayden.

event.name: Elijah at Age 3
event.description: My mom took this picture suring an Easter celebration that took place in 2010.

event.name: Micheal and Eric in 1988
event.description: The 80's were brutal.  My brother and I were skinny as rails.

event.name: Eric, Mike and Jay
event.description: This photo of my brother, Jay and me was taken back in the 70's during one of many of my Grandfather's famouse family reunion barbeque's.

event.name: Eric at the Prom
event.description: Check out my brother Eric in his prom digs!

event.name: Erin and Cutipy!
event.description: My wife, Erin in a photo with my mom's dog, Cutipy.

event.name: Grand Kids!!
event.description: My mom with ALL of her grandchildren!  This photo made her so happy.  I feel her emotions when I took this photo for her.

event.name: Me at the prom
event.description: Some used to say I looked very Eddie Murphy like in this prom picture.  Heh Heh Heh Heh Heh...

event.name: Thanksgiving, 2015
event.description: All of us during Thanksgiving 2015.  This was an awesome day and the food was unforgettable!

event.name: Regal Photo
event.description: I have always loved this picture of my mom.  This photo looks so good in black and white.  Sheila, you will always be loved and you will be missed. We love you.
